Legal_Issue: Eligibility for refugee status based on membership in a particular social group (the poor)
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed refugee status as part of the 'poor' social group in Haiti; relied on general documentary evidence about mistreatment of the poor without personal evidence of persecution
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of refugee status decision
Court_Ruling: Federal Court upheld the Refugee Division's decision to reject the claim
Grounds_for_Claim: Membership in a particular social group (the poor)
Legal_Standard: Must demonstrate both objective and subjective fear of persecution due to membership in a particular social group
Assessment_Factor: Presence or absence of personal evidence of persecution
Procedural_Issue: Review by Refugee Division and subsequent judicial review by Federal Court
Credibility_Assessment: Applicant failed to provide credible personal evidence of persecution
Evidence_Used: General documentary evidence about conditions of the poor in Haiti
Application_Basis: Claim under the Convention refugee definition
Evidence_Assessed: Lack of personal experience of persecution; reliance on generalized country condition reports
Governing_Rule: To qualify as a Convention refugee, applicant must show both objective and subjective fear of persecution based on a protected ground
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failure to provide personal evidence of persecution or specific threats
Outcome: Claim rejected; application for judicial review dismissed
Harm_Assessment: No individualized risk of harm established
Cause_Description: Applicant's claim lacked personal evidence of persecution despite general evidence of hardship faced by the poor in Haiti
Evidence_Handling: General country condition evidence considered but found insufficient without personal nexus
Evidence_Issues: Insufficient personal evidence to support claim
Evidence_Assessment: Generalized evidence not enough to establish personal fear of persecution
Decision_Rationale: Applicant did not meet the legal burden to prove well-founded fear of persecution based on membership in a particular social group
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of firsthand testimony or documentation of personal targeting
Legal_Standard_Applied: Convention refugee definition â€“ fear of persecution on account of membership in a particular social group
